description: Scene Switcher Fast Scene Navigation Tool is a Unity Editor extension designed to supercharge your workflow. Quickly switch between Build Settings scenes or all project scenes, with colorful UI tabs, auto-refresh, smart save prompts, and one-click scene locating. Includes a friendly welcome window for first-time users. Perfect for teams and solo devs working on multi-scene projects.
